website_summaries.verdict: High-fiber option will help keep your cat full for extended periods, preventing overeating.
pros: High in fiber to help cats feel full longer
Free of artificial colors and flavors
Low fat, low calorie food assists with weight loss and management
cons: Designed for cats 1 to 7 years old, not ideal for older cats

customer_reviews.title: My fat cat is still FAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes that my 23lb, 7 year old cat would lose some much needed weight. We are now on month 3 and he hasn’t even lost an ounce. I do however think it’s healthier than what he was eating prior to this and he seems to eat less. I put 2 rationed feedings (approximately 1/2 cup each sitting). With his prior dry food he ate 2 cups a day. With this food, he appears to be more satisfied with eating less. I’m still hoping that in time we will see a drop in weight.
customer_reviews.author: RON TIBEAU

customer_reviews.title: If you can't trust Dick Van Patten to feed your cats, who can you trust?
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's high quality. It's just that my cats are whiny fat (though lovable) PITAs and enjoy telling me, at length, how much they dislike it. WELL TOO BAD. IT IS GOOD FOR YOU, MY ROLY POLYS. Suck it up.
customer_reviews.author: shiversodread

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Since starting my big fat cat on this food a few months ago he has actually lost weight! He is a senior guy and just doesn't love running around much. He has always been a pretty big guy, but recently got a little too big. He loves the food and has gotten slightly more energetic. Also his fur seems a little bit softer. I tried this food on a whim because it was only $8.00 at my local Petco and I am so grateful that it has worked!
customer_reviews.author: Tori H.

customer_reviews.title: The cat has lost 3-5 lbs
customer_reviews.text: If only human weight loss was this easy. The cat used to clean his bowl in at Mach-4 and cry for more. When he was on his old food, he was on a rationed 1/2 cup twice daily, and was severely overweight. Plus, he was developing kitty-tummy-troubles, which left unpleasant piles of kitty barf all over my carpet. Yuck. Now he eats as much as he wants, and has lost about 30% of his body weight. (Yes, he was a BIG cat.) I don't think he likes it very much, because he doesn't clean his bowl anymore, but since this is all he gets, he deals with it. Plus, no barfing. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and feed a 4th, feral that has adopted us. One of my cats got quite fat on prior food I was feeding them so onto a diet she went. Challenge; she is the only one overweight and they free feed kibble with canned supplement. This has made a huge and immediate difference. The biggest surprise; everyone loves it and often prefers it over the canned. My female is also losing weight! Final comment, the ingredients are absolutely top notch! Thank you for making a great food! Most highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Most diet cat foods are canned, which is more expensive and less convenient. I recently got a 2nd cat who came with a bag of her Meow Mix. Instantly, new cat wanted Fat Catz. Of course, my little tubby one wanted Meow Mix. So I mix them half and half and feed both. Cat weight loss is slow going. And they are so manipulative.
customer_reviews.author: Pictomaniac

customer_reviews.title: My cat refused to eat it
customer_reviews.text: First off, my cat just flat out refused to eat this stuff. We had to go back to her regular food because she was starving herself even with a bowl of this given every day. It's very powdery, the pieces crumble easily and there was a large amount of powdered up food at the bottom of the bag when we first opened it, as well as powdered bits in every serving we scooped out. Better to just feed your cat less than try and feed them this stuff, it seems full of fillers they don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good food but wasted product in bag
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this food and I've had them on it for 6 months...but... They seem to be more hungry with it and each bag has a LOT of "dust" from broken food. We have to pour the bag into a strainer. Seems like more waste and hassle than it's worth. The upside is my vet said our cats are super healthy 👍
customer_reviews.author: Loree

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty significant weight reduction in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my 14 year old cat for 2 years now. When I started she weighed over 18 LB and now she's in the low 14 LB range. This is pretty significant weight reduction in 2 years, and I give the credit to this low calorie food. She loves the taste and is much more active now after shedding the lbs. I've also noticed her long-haired coat is much smoother and shinier.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: My go to cat food
customer_reviews.text: My oldest cat (4.5 years) has been eating this food since she was 2. Just switched my youngest cat (10 months) over to this and she took to it no problems. Great ingredients and it’s formulated for indoor cats who don’t get the kind of running around exercise that outdoors do. Helps to keep them at a healthy weight. Oldest is 12lbs and youngest is 7.5lbs. Vet loves that they keep good weights and that makes for a happy cat mama.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats gained weight!
customer_reviews.text: All three of my cats have gained weight since being on this for 6 months, coming from being on Purina (fed the same amount). My one cat who I was mostly concerned with has gained over 7lbs since being on this food. I spoke with my vet and he doesn’t recommend this brand and we will be switching.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Slows down the cat's eating.
customer_reviews.text: Cat cat sometime eats too fast and then throws up but with this cat food she ate slower and not as much so she did not throw up when on this food. The cat has lost a few ounces of body fat. I still give the cat some of her regular cat food. The product is effective!
customer_reviews.author: RickSound

customer_reviews.title: Fat cat
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is working for my fat cat. My only complaint is that by the time I receive it, it has been handled so much that a large portion of it has turned to powder. Perhaps it needs to be made to keep the shape from crumbling.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: but none of my 7 cats liked it. They just nibbled a small amount and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several fat cats so I tried this food to help with weight loss. It looks attractive and Natural Balance is a well known quality nutritional food, but none of my 7 cats liked it. They just nibbled a small amount and walked away. I am disappointed and will go back to Pro Plan weight management which they like.
customer_reviews.author: Ratlady47

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but just not for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that need to lose weight. I love the quality of Natural balance in the dog food, so gave this a try. Well, it claims to leave your cat with a full feeling, so they won't bug you incessantly to feed them all day. Sadly, my cat didn't get the memo. Granted, he may have bothering me for more kibble because he really liked it, but nonetheless, it also was creating horrendously strong smelling poo- all the extra fiber I suppose! So it was back to searching for a low calorie kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Cabragg

customer_reviews.title: Cats like, but too much of a mess.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, as much as my cats like this low cal food, I don't -it gets in their paws(I have a slow feeder) and tracks all over the house. Much of the dry food broke into sandlike and dusty consistency. Could be because of shipping it or just that it's low cal. Still on the hunt for a good low cal dry food.
customer_reviews.author: SheLittle

customer_reviews.title: I bet this would be good for some cats... but
customer_reviews.text: But my cat gained 3 lbs on it. I took Leo to the vet and he recommended that some diet foods for cats are on their own level of "diet" food. So one brand may be more diet than another. Unfortunately, this just didn't work for my cat - but it may work for yours. It's still worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Gaynel13

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a food she'll eat
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately one of my cats has put on a little more weight than the vet wanted. I tried other products but this was the only one she likes and lost 2 lbs so far!
customer_reviews.author: L. Olexa

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with the Amazon version of this
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this food and have been eating for a few years. Beware of purchasing on Amazon - something is wrong with this batch and they won't go near it. Need to find at a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: higgs

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Cat will not eat it. To look at this cat, you would not think she was picky! I can only imagine it must taste like rotten feet if this 20 pounder will not even eat it!!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl hays

customer_reviews.title: Great food, Amazon can’t ship it properly
customer_reviews.text: My fat cats love this cat food. However, I’d say 5% of the food is just dust. Amazon has shipped it several times underneath one or two heavier items. This month it came underneath a 30 pound bag of kitty litter. I’m guessing this bag could be closer to 10% dust. I’m giving it one more shipment to see if the box packers can put heavier items on the bottom. (Think eggs and bread put in a bag underneath a flat of canned goods.) Otherwise, chewy.com will get new business.
customer_reviews.author: DuckMom516

customer_reviews.title: Needed to sift for food pellets
customer_reviews.text: My cats will eat this and maybe it was just this bag but so much if it was just pulverized like sawdust. I have to pick out the actual pellets from the dust to feed them. I'm not sure if it's supposed to be like this or not and my cats do seem to like it but I just was s bit concerned by what that was
customer_reviews.author: M. Marino

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Someone at Petco recommended this food for my two cats. I love natural balance, I get their wet food too. It’s much better and healthier for my cats . There is a big difference in the price here and in the store so I subscribed to it on amazon for every 3 months. It’s great food, my cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: milena jakimoska

customer_reviews.title: I’m hopeful that this will help my cat slim down ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m hopeful that this will help my cat slim down a bit, the vet told us that he was getting a little chunky, which is surprising because he is a very picky eater. He eats this (mixed with Ziwipeak) and didn’t notice a difference from his old food.
customer_reviews.author: Becker

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Holds their weight steady and they like it. I have two large 20 lb. British Shorthair cats. They do get the measured dose for their weight; one to lose weight and the other to maintain his weight. I'm giving it a four as when you pour it out of the bag it needs to go through a colander to remove all of the powder, which is over a cup of powder n a 6lb. bag. Buying it through Amazon is less expensive than any of the local pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: they're still fat cats after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Both my older cats and once in a while kitten will eat it. Even though the kitten has her own food I catch her eating this. Haven't noticed either of my fat cats losing any weight. the ingredients are good at least. No cassava root or anything that are in the other cat foods.
customer_reviews.author: angel7472

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients for my chubby wubbies
customer_reviews.text: Good ingredients for my chubby wubbies. They eat it without any problems and they eat less of it than the old food. For 2 cats I use about 1-1/2 6# bags per month.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Peters

customer_reviews.title: and I am at least happy to say my cat likes the food
customer_reviews.text: I'm about half-way through the bag, and I am at least happy to say my cat likes the food. Although, she has never not liked a brand of cat food... probably why I needed to buy this. Anyway, my cat lost some weight already, and seems to be easier on her knee. Stinks pretty bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: The two oldies are both pretty fat, so I've been feeding this to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two senior cats and a young female. The two oldies are both pretty fat, so I've been feeding this to the seniors to help regulate their weight. It's been a little over a month and I haven't noticed any change in the senior female but my senior male does seem to have lost a few pounds (he's lighter and there is more skin when I pick him up). Since they're 12+, I've also been supplementing with Well & Good's Vitamin Gel for Senior Cats.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Two paws down
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a weigh loss product because my cat didn't like it at all. In addition, as others have said, a large amount of the product is powder, probably because there's not enough fat to hold it all together.
customer_reviews.author: carb101

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: We have multiple cats in our house. This is the only food we've found that our cats like, that keeps them at a healthy weight, that helps prevent hairballs and other vommiting Or gorging. One of our cats has a sensitive stomach, and this is the only food we'll order now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Natural Balance products but they need to address this ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat eats this and he HAS lost weight however this biggest drawback with this food is the DUST. I have to mix it with another food to avoid it. I love Natural Balance products but they need to address this problem. If your cat needs to lose weight this works and he doesn't seem overly hungry but keep lots of water handy!
customer_reviews.author: Pongosgirl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for a lazy overweight house cat!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty has been overweight for a while. And the vet recommended that he needed to loose 3-4lbs. Which is so hard for a house cat. But so far this transition to natural balance has been great. It has been 4 full months now and he has lost 1lb!! So amazing.. and he loves it. The kibbles are small enough for him to chew up without causing a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Klimek

customer_reviews.title: The Only Thing That Has Worked For My Fat Cat
customer_reviews.text: I have an overweight cat, and I have tried numerous different foods to help her lose weight. She has lost 1.5lbs in 4 months since we started feeding her this,and she does seem to beg less. She also really likes the way it tastes. Snarf city. I'm really impressed with the impact that this food has had on her weight, and I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blair

customer_reviews.title: Just what the cat doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect to feed our three legged cat [car accident meant removal of one hind leg] so cat now indoor cat who likes to eat and must not gain weight.
customer_reviews.author: LAWK

customer_reviews.title: Good food for fat kitties
customer_reviews.text: Good food for fat kitties, lots of vegetables to counteract feline obesity. Only complaint is there tends to be a lot of crushed kibble powder at the bottom of the bag, which my cats dislike to eat.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I'd rate this a zero if I could. Both cats are starving themselves rather than eat this food. This certainly isn't a healthy way for them to lose weight. I wasted my money ordering a large bag that I've tried to get them to eat for the last 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food.  Weight loss is slow, but steady.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our 16.5lb cat on this food for 4-5 months now. He loves it. He’s lost about 1lb during that time, which seems to be a healthy way to go. (I reviewed this product previously and said it was ineffective. I was wrong.)
customer_reviews.author: Knoxcamper

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't touch it.
customer_reviews.text: I have six cats. None of them will touch it. And they know I'm holding out with their regular brand.🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: DL S.

customer_reviews.title: quality cat food!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding this brand locally and a girlfriend suggested I try Amazon. I'm quite pleased with this brand and the fact that it arrives on my doorstep. The quality of the nutrients meets my cats dietary needs.
customer_reviews.author: The Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: My cat liked this. She lost weight on it hut you need to portion them. She was not super fond of the taste though because she didn't finish her portion usually but when I gave her a different kind she ate it all up. But I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, gets them to a healthy weight
customer_reviews.text: have used with two different cats now and it really works well. Just be sure to measure as they love the taste
customer_reviews.author: BOSCO

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy yet
customer_reviews.text: So far my cat hates it! I’m hoping he will start to eat it, but maybe that’s why cats get thin. They hate it.
customer_reviews.author: D Schultz

customer_reviews.title: My cats will not eat this food
customer_reviews.text: They only ate a few bites over a few days so I got rid of the rest of it
customer_reviews.author: haikou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fat cats
customer_reviews.text: The only food that helps my cat lose weight! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: One third of bag was kibble powder.
customer_reviews.text: a full 1/3 of the bag was unusable broken down kibble powder... BOO!
customer_reviews.author: JDF

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but powder...
customer_reviews.text: The food seemed good, for what wasn't disintegrated. Not sure about root of the problem, but unfortunately switched to something else due to the powder (which I thought might have been caused by bugs, but didn't find any). Unfortunate as my cat needs to lose weight, not puke from saw dust.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this brand of food and I like the fact that it doesn't smell 'funky' when you pass by his food dish like some other previous brands I have had. It is still too soon to determine if he is losing weight, but I am sure I'll be seeing results in a few more months. Plus, I like the fact that the cat pictured on the bag looks like my cat!
customer_reviews.author: Ysands

customer_reviews.title: My cats have eaten this for past two years
customer_reviews.text: It's been my standard "cat gravel" for the past two years. I have one super-slim cat and one mega fatso. They both happily eat this stuff, with some canned soft food on the side. My piggo cat remains quite overweight, don't expect miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Meerschweinchen Meister

customer_reviews.title: My cat wouldn’t eat from this bag
customer_reviews.text: My cat wouldn’t eat from this bag but will eat the same brand from Mud Bay store.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskerteer

customer_reviews.title: Our cat has eaten it for years
customer_reviews.text: She really likes it. Helps her produces a healthy stool too. The feeding guide is helpful - follow it carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Sr Happy Popi

customer_reviews.title: Cat dislikes, a lot of food dust.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is usually not too picky but has a hard time with this food. He barely eats any until he realizes he's really hungry and that's all he has. This food is put into his timed food container and all it really spits out is powder/dust. I've never had a food contain so much food dust. This is the last bag of this we will buy.
customer_reviews.author: CB15

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOST OVER A POUND IN A MONTH!
customer_reviews.text: My obese cat (13.6 pounds as of May 1) is now 12.2 pounds on her "skinny girl diet". She takes right too it and is visibly skinnier. Took a month. No extra exercise beyond usual playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cause UTI in my cat!!
customer_reviews.text: Cause UTI in my male cat. I bought this for my cat and he’s had two UTI’s since switching him. Discontinued using and put him on a wet food diet and his condition has cleared up. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: positivenrg

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Never any issues with either of our cats eating this.
customer_reviews.author: Kent A. Winrich

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this food!
customer_reviews.text: My obese cat LOVES this food, and doesn't feel deprived at all. He's slowly losing weight, and is very happy. So far he's down 5 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cats will actually eat this even with lower calories!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to get my cats used to this particular flavor. Once it happened, they started losing some weight, which I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: tonithecatfanatic

customer_reviews.title: Greatv
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it! This food is great your fat cat will lose weight :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Cats appear to like this brand. I believe it to be more nutritious than super market brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most cats enjoy this food.
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes the food,it's healthy and keeps her weight under control.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Meow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Years using offerings in this brand for our cat from kitten to maturity. He's healthy, shiny coat and always finishes his bowl.
customer_reviews.author: ValNina

customer_reviews.title: Our fats are indoors and have gotten pretty heavy they seem to like this food and the ...
customer_reviews.text: we have this item on subscribe and save. Our fats are indoors and have gotten pretty heavy they seem to like this food and the weight gain has stopped. Also love the subscribe and save function since we are busy professionals .
customer_reviews.author: Megan N. Stack

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after my cats starting eating this the both experienced nite time vomiting. We have discontinued the food and the vomiting has stopped. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my fat cat. Just a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my fat cat. Just a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brevetti

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing that this formula fills my cat and keeps her ...
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing that this formula fills my cat and keeps her going until her next mealtime. She has lost weight and it was a gradual weight loss that is good for her.
customer_reviews.author: M. MURRAY

customer_reviews.title: It's my cats favorite by far!!
customer_reviews.text: No problems, put it in front of my Maine Coon and it's gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped our overweight cat lose the right amount of weight
customer_reviews.text: Our vet said our cat was overweight and had to lose 3-4 pounds. We tried a few different low-calorie or weight-loss cat foods, but nothing worked. A volunteer at the animal shelter where we got our cat recommended this food saying her cat loved it and it really worked. We switched our cat over to it in January and it has helped her to healthfully lose over 3 pounds in the last four months. She's kind of a picky eater too (which I know is weird since she was overweight...) but she really loves this food too. We primarily give her the wet food version of this, but she is always begging for this dry food :)
customer_reviews.author: ashleymae

customer_reviews.title: Cat. lost 3.5 lbs!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was 16 lbs when she started this food about a year ago. She is now down to 12.5. She is healthy and happy to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: The Diva

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loves it. She's not skinny but maybe a little less fat. My skinny cat prefers this to her regular food,, so I let her eat it too, although she doesn't need to lose any weight at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sandii

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like this the best and has lost 4 pounds in ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked and tried many different brands for our fat cat. He seems to like this the best and has lost 4 pounds in the past year. It also seems to help with his allergies, not sure why but the ingredients seem to be better than what is in other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chas m.

customer_reviews.title: Timely but useless
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived on time as promised, but the food that arrived is RANCID and not suitable to feed to my cat. When I purchase this same food from a pet store, my cat loves it and it's helping him to lose weight when used as indicated. However, I will not be buying online again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rau

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My 2 fat cats seem to do well on this food. They are not to picky as long as it's food. This is there 2nd large bag not sure of weight loss progress.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Stinky poops!
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes the food, but he isn't losing any weight...furthermore, his excrement has become very soft, mushy and it smells like the worst thing on earth. I will probably switch once he's finished the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Paterson-Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: Great food for my kitty, he has abit of an overeating problem and this food seems to be working well to combat weight gain
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: This helped my cat lose weight but is too plant ...
customer_reviews.text: This helped my cat lose weight but is too plant based for proper urinary tract health. Within days of switching to this food my cat began experiencing alkaline urine which can lead to crystal formation and uti.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My cats did not like this food AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: My cats did not like this food AT ALL! But one of them needed to lose some weight and now they both eat it. Not as eagerly as the 'old' food, but they are eating. Have yet to weigh the chubby cat to see if she's lost any weight - BUT she does have more energy.
customer_reviews.author: sz.

customer_reviews.title: Losing Weight & Healthier Coat!
customer_reviews.text: This food is ahhhmazing... Not only are our cats losing weight, but their fur is softer, they seem to have less cat dander, and they LOVE it! So grateful to be getting them healthier! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have cats that just don't always get optimal amounts of exercise and Fat Cats has helped a lot. They were gaining in lbs., but, now they are loosing some and they LOVE it. Must taste pretty good to them.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick shipping!! My cat loves this food and has lost some weight since he's been on it. He's had no reactions from it either, we couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves this food. Just wish it were just SLIGHTLY cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: David August

customer_reviews.title: Love this food and so did my cat
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. My 16 lbs cat is now a healthy 12.5 lbs. He is a naturally big guy and this food satisfied him. He also has a missing tooth, so the small size of the pieces really worked well for him. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff for my cat. keeps her from getting the tummy ball of fat.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy Gross

customer_reviews.title: Our cats didn't really like this food
customer_reviews.text: Our cats didn't really like this food, but they ate it anyway. It has a cheap look and smell to it, I don't blame them for not eating it.
customer_reviews.author: C Lev

customer_reviews.title: My FAT cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My FAT cat loves this food and even though she isn't really losing weight, she isn't gaining!! I let her eat all she wants...
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Cats liked the food well enough but a good portion of ...
customer_reviews.text: Cats liked the food well enough but a good portion of the bag was just food that had been ground into powder. (I later bought another bag in the store to be sure it wasn't due to delivery- had the same issue).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Stedem

customer_reviews.title: Very dusty
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I paid for dust instead of kibble. There's always so much dust left over in my cat's bowl that he can't eat and I end up dumping in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Lili Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good value, cats will eat it but can tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: Great value, and I'm sure its better for my cats, but they noticeably don't like this as much as the regular natural balance foods.
customer_reviews.author: bemsha

customer_reviews.title: The smell from the product is powerful. Not only ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell from the product is powerful. Not only did the pellets themselves have a strong odor, but more importantly it resulted in my cats feces having an incredibly strong odor. I did not find that the product helped my cats lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Quality Food, Reasonably Priced, Cat Likes It, but You Lose a Lot to Crumbling
customer_reviews.text: This is the only option I have found for reasonably priced, low calorie cat food. My cat likes it, which is a bonus. However, I find that each package is usually about 20% crumbs! I have purchased it in the store and through Amazon, and no matter what it always has this problem. Since my cat won't eat the crumbs and they make a mess, I have to sift them out into the trash. I have never had this problem with any other kibble and I have both cats and dogs, and have used many varieties of food.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've trusted Natural Balance for twenty years. My cats are healthy. The reduced fat content is great for indoor and older cats.
customer_reviews.author: Penny PincherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cats like it
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey as all blue products but appears to have healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: The Sandman

customer_reviews.title: This food works
customer_reviews.text: My overweight tom cat has lost 2 lbs of body fat and is doing well with this food. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: BILL B

customer_reviews.title: it's working out great my cat is starting to lose the weight
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's working out great my cat is starting to lose the weight. Thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Onstott

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Was not all that impressed with it nor were my cats. It Is low in calories but not that different from their regular feed which also has good ingredients but is a lot cheaper. Will not be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barb S.

customer_reviews.title: My cat did that like it and it did not agree with him
customer_reviews.text: My cat did not seem to care for it at first. When he did start eating it it made him vomit.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good for for slow and safe weight loss
customer_reviews.text: My "fat cat" loves this stuff and she is slowly losing weight (1 pound a year as advised by vet) eating it.
customer_reviews.author: frodoboyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Our cat is overweight and she is very picky. ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is overweight and she is very picky. Cat has always had loose bowels and she adores this cat food and has regular bowel movements. The size and texture of this food is just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sami loves it and he is used to the more expensive non grain foods.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Fat Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my Fat Cat. She is not a fuzzy cat and she will eat plain or with oil and Diatotmatious Earth
customer_reviews.author: jMajor

customer_reviews.title: Caused allergic dermatitis for our cat,
customer_reviews.text: Seems effective for weight loss and cat feeling full, but within two weeks of switching, our cat has massive dandruff and loss of coat sheen. We are switching back to Royal Canin in spite of the cost difference. Not worth the price savings when it makes the cat uncomfortable and increases allergens in the house!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

product_meta.title: Natural Balance Fat Cats Low Calorie Chicken & Salmon Meal for Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Size:15 Lb. BagFat Cats Low Calorie Formula Dry Cat Food is formulated specifically for overweight adult cats. Designed to keep your pet nutritionally balanced, this diet offers protein and fiber, a combination that may help your cat feel full as they lose weight in a healthy, delicious way.
feature_bullets: Contains 1 - 15 Pound Bag of Dry Cat Food
Unique protein blend helps preserve lean muscle
High fiber content helps keep your cat satisfied
Low calorie diet for overweight cats

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
